item.title: Eeyore and Optimus Prime
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I was watching My Friends Tigger & Pooh with the girls the other morning and thought that I heard something familiar in the voice of Eeyore. It sounded like a depressed version of Optimus Prime. A quick trip to the IMDB page for Peter Cullen confirms that he did the voice for both characters. Looks […]
item.content:encoded: I was watching My Friends Tigger & Pooh with the girls the other morning and thought that I heard something familiar in the voice of Eeyore. It sounded like a depressed version of Optimus Prime. A quick trip to the IMDB page for Peter Cullen confirms that he did the voice for both characters. Looks like he’s done a number of cartoon character voices over the years.
